extraction_proof.caption_text: 5 UI design principles every designer should know
extraction_proof.extracted_summary: Carousel by @designpro [Caption] "5 UI design principles every designer should know"

extraction_proof.caption_text:
3 productivity hacks that actually work:

1. Time blocking - dedicate specific hours to specific tasks
2. The 2-minute rule - if it takes less than 2 minutes, do it now
3. Batch similar tasks together - context switching kills productivity

Which one will you try first?
